        Parameters:
        encryptedText - the text String to be decrypted
        Returns:
        the decrypted String usage example: String pksPw = FlareClientUtil.decrypt("9cBB801VfbB95YRdi0fNg");

                                                 throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Validate a content string based on defined taxii and stix schema files
        Parameters:
        content - the content String to be validated
        Returns:
        a list of validation errors if there are errors, otherwise it is empty
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - usage example: List errors = FlareClientUtil.validateTaxii(taxiiDocStr);
